SUBSECTION.TEXT: This is a very simple module that models a calendar month.

SUBSECTION.HEAD: INSTALLATION
SUBSECTION.TEXT: To install this module type the following:
SUBSECTION.CODE: perl Makefile.PL make make test make install

SUBSECTION.HEAD: DEPENDENCIES
SUBSECTION.TEXT: This module has no external dependencies.
